txt.en: This appears to be a regular tortoise
The Talking Tortoise
Return to Angârmu with the tortoise

'Ah, hello! I need your assistance with this, I can not go myself.

'To the east, you will find tortoises. You must go there and bring back my friend.

'He is easy to spot, of course. I do miss our talks. Yes, he will be the one that talks, the others they are not friendly and they do not talk. I wish to talk with my friend though, bring him here for me.'
Speak with the tortoise nearby
Try speaking with a different tortoise in the area
This appears to be another regular tortoise. You see a slightly more interesting one nearby
Attempt to speak with the tortoise
The tortoise doesn't answer, but surely it must be the right one
Angârmu has told you of a mystical talking tortoise he has encountered nearby and asked you to seek it out.
Returned to Angârmu with the tortoise
Angârmu has asked that you seek out a mystical talking tortoise near Zikrum-dûl to the east along the river.
Try speaking with a different tortoise in the area
You found a slightly more interesting tortoise at the den near Zikrum-dûl. Try speaking with it to see if it's the one Angârmu told you about.
You found a tortoise at the den near Zikrum-dûl. Speak with it to see if it's the one Angârmu told you about.

'Yes, yes! It is him! My good friend it is good to see you!

Angârmu takes the tortoise from you.

'Thank you, thank you! Now if you will, we have much to speak on.'

Angârmu begins having a quiet one-sided conversation with the tortoise and seemingly forgets you are there.
You tried speaking to a tortoise at the den near Zikrum-dûl, but it turned out to be a generic tortoise. Speak with another to see if it's the one Angârmu told you about.
Return to Angârmu in Malgâma near Zikrum-dûl with the tortoise.
Attempt to speak with the tortoise
Find the tortoise den
Speak with the tortoise nearby
Returned to Angârmu with the tortoise
This appears to be a regular tortoise
